text: Alin Ilie Dudea (born 6 June 1997) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays for CSM Reșița, on loan from Dinamo București as a defender (central and left), but also as a central midfielder.http://www.sport.ro/fotbal- intern/interviu-cu-alin-dudea.html ==Honours== ;Chindia Târgoviște *Liga II: 2018–19 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Craiova Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:Liga II players Category:ACS Foresta Suceava players Category:AFC Chindia Târgoviște players Category:CSM Reșița players
title: Alin Dudea
